attributes.action: no more taxes get the pm and his party out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the labour party was for the people now with all the taxes the pm has put into place or plans to, is going to make the richer rich and the working class that put the pm into place porer

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on tax:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
